name: Mampfer
description:
You are a big flabbely piece of slime and you are hungry. Eat as many ice cream as you can. Otherwise you will tire and grind to a halt. Maybe you should eat some fruits from time to time to gain extra points. Avoid the penguins. This nasty little birds will slow you down.

Press the screen to gain height. Collect ice cream for energy and fruits for bonuses. Avoid the penguins.
